verbs.description: a sermon for [ARG0: all saints] [V: sundaysome] modern beatitudes – a sermon for all saints sunday click above to listen along this summer when i was at the greenbelt festival in the uk i stood on the top of a tall grassy hill and i and 2 of my dear friends padraig and doug 1 each preached on the beatitudes the event was called sermons on the mount and it was my … jesus mother teresa richard rohr blessed padraig sermon on the mount facebook beatitudes mount and all saints meeker
